684729784.name: Stamina Enhancement
684729784.desc: Increases all Helldivers' stamina capacity and recovery.

876985512.name: Localization Confusion
876985512.desc: Increases the time between enemy encounters.

1110686504.name: Vitality Enhancement
1110686504.desc: Allows all Helldivers to resist injury.

1908198785.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
1908198785.desc: Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades, and Stims.

4136928865.name: UAV Recon Booster
4136928865.desc: Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range.
